response.original_title: Beyond Their Years: The Incredible Legacies of Herb Carnegie and Buck O’Neil
response.overview: Beyond Their Years depicts the compelling story of parallel lives lived by sports and social justice icons Herb Carnegie (hockey) and Buck O’Neil (baseball), who were excluded, because of their race, from competing at the highest professional leagues of the sports they loved. Instead of becoming angry and bitter, they channeled the injustice they both experienced into pioneering work that made their respective sports, and the world, more inclusive.
response.title: Beyond Their Years: The Incredible Legacies of Herb Carnegie and Buck O’Neil
